misconceptions.inferred_category_name: None (correct implementation of linear search with early exit)
misconceptions.student_thought_process: The student believes that scanning the array from left to right and stopping at the first match will yield the first occurrence index, and that using -1 as a sentinel indicates 'not found'.
misconceptions.conceptual_gap: No conceptual gap detected. This matches Java’s execution model: the loop checks each element in order; on the first equality, it records the index and breaks; if no match occurs, index remains -1.
misconceptions.error_manifestation: None; produces correct output per the specification.
